name: The Duel beta3
description:
The Duel beta3

Top down shooter pvp,invite your friends in this 1v1 offline pvp.Your default weapon is tec9 but you can take a shotgun or sniper by found it in random position.The Airdrop/weapon box is shootable,you can shoot them and the weapon box will randomly spawn in other area in the map.

Beta version 3:

-change main menu and adding splash screen

-fix bug

-sniper has 1-3 seconds cooldown to shoot again

Note:

-it has only 1 map,next update i will make more map

-it has bad graphics( i am is 13 years old and bad english)

-if you find bug,tell me 

-full version soon...

Sorry for bad grammar/english, i am from Indonesia

SALAM
